thread.title: Ryan H
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Ryan H

author: Ryan H
title: Ryan H
text: I've only had a quick look at the sunglasses as they are a present but they seem very good and the right ones I ordered. Considering they came from Italy to Australia in 5/6 days that is impressive. Only flaw was the credit card international fee I received when I paid via Paypal - there needs to be notice of this to the customer before paying. Alessandra in Customer Service was very polite and prompt in her replies, but I needed to escalate to Paypal Resolution Centre to get the credit card fee reimbursed.
